abstract: Options for initializing a LookAroundPreview object.

# LookAroundPreviewOptions

**Interface**

Options for initializing a LookAroundPreview object.

## Declaration

```swift
interface LookAroundPreviewOptions
    extends CommonLookAroundOptions
```

## Possible badge positions

- **BottomTrailing**: Places the badge on the bottom trailing corner of the Look Around preview.
- **TopLeading**: Places the badge on the top leading corner of the Look Around preview.
- **TopTrailing**: Places the badge on the top trailing corner of the Look Around preview.

## Controlling the badge position

- **badgePosition**: A value you set to specific the position of a badge on the Look Around preview.
- **LookAroundBadgePosition**: Values that control the positions of a badge on a Look Around preview.

## Exploring at street level

- **LookAround**: A view that allows someone to see a street level view of a place.
- **LookAroundOptions**: Options for initializing a LookAround view.
- **LookAroundPreview**: A class that renders a preview of a Look Around view.
- **LookAroundScene**: Object that represents the current location of the view.
- **CommonLookAroundOptions**: Options that control the behavior of Look Around views.
- **AbstractLookAround**: An abstract class that provides a common interface for Look Around views.
- **lookAroundViews**: A list of all the Look Around objects that are currently active on a page.

## Inherits From

- CommonLookAroundOptions
